action.action-desc: Mr. Bacon (for himself and Mr. Pappas) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Veterans' Affairs

form.official-title: To amend title 38, United States Code, to increase the amount paid by the Secretary of Veterans Affairs to veterans for improvements and structural alterations furnished as part of home health services.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Autonomy for Disabled Veterans Act.

section.header: Increase in amount available to disabled veterans for improvements and structural alterations furnished as part of home health services

subsection.text: Paragraph (2) of section 1717(a) of title 38, United States Code, is amendedâ€”

paragraph.text: in subparagraph (A)(ii), by striking $6,800 and inserting $10,000; and
in subparagraph (B)(ii), by striking $2,000 and inserting $5,000.

subsection.text: The amendments made by subsection (a) shall apply with respect to a veteran who first applies for benefits under section 1717(a)(2) of title 38, United States Code, on or after the date of the enactment of this Act.

A veteran who exhausts the eligibility of such veteran for benefits under section 1717(a)(2) of title 38, United States Code, before the date of the enactment of this Act is not entitled to additional benefits under such section by reason of the amendments made by subsection (a).

section.text: Section 1717(a) of title 38, United States Code, is further amended by adding at the end the following:

paragraph.text: On an annual basis, the Secretary shall increase the dollar amount in effect under subsection (a)(2) by a percentage equal to the percentage by which the Consumer Price Index for all urban consumers (United States city average) increased during the 12-month period ending with the last month for which Consumer Price Index data is available. In the event that such Consumer Price Index does not increase during such period, the Secretary shall maintain the dollar amount in effect under subsection (a)(2) during the previous fiscal year.
